mapper.select: SELECT PID, PSN, TIM, LCN, FCN, TF, FEE, BAL, ATT, CRN, XRN, DMON, EPID, ETIM, LPID, LTIM, TAC FROM ( SELECT PID, PSN, TIM, LCN, FCN, TF, FEE, BAL, ATT, CRN, XRN, DMON, EPID, ETIM, LPID, LTIM, TAC,rownum r FROM T_CPU_CONSUME_NOBUS t1 WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_CPU_CONSUME_ERROR_NOBUS WHERE PID=t1.PID AND PSN=t1.PSN ) AND rownum <= #{endNum} ) WHERE r > #{startNum}
SELECT count(1) AS notesSum,sum(TF) AS amountSum from T_CPU_CONSUME_NOBUS t1 WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_CPU_CONSUME_ERROR_NOBUS WHERE PID=t1.PID AND PSN=t1.PSN )
SELECT count(1) from T_CPU_CONSUME_NOBUS t1 WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_CPU_CONSUME_ERROR_NOBUS where t1.PID=PID AND t1.PSN=PSN )
